summary: My first successful Modelimport ;) 2 Sword standalone
descriptionHtml:
My other: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22012]Garrisons Blade[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17064]The Alligator[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19383]Green Dragon Crescent Blade[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16193]Bleach weapons[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15268]D-Greyman weapons[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14786]Soul Eater weapons[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14968]Stormbringer[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14616]Black Sword, Yoru[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14020]Rorona Zorros Katanas[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10357]ApachiiSkyHair Retexture[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4400]My Coolsims retexture mod[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4734]Vampire Gameplay Overhaul[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5521]Rans and Yinsiyue Hairstyles Retexture[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6720]Kuma Kuma Kokuma Hair and Bagserk Hair Retexture[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5152]Beautiful Hair Retexture[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7752]Iron Claw Daggers Fist Weapons Retexture[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12797]Soulfang & Darkfang[/url]
===================================
Nice mod from Debdut using my sword model, try it out! [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24258]Quest for Umbra[/url]
===================================

2 Swords, model for both is the same just different Textures. Finally maged to to get the model through Blender and Nifskope and ingame. Mostly done to see if im able to ;) Soulfang has Wings on the side and the scabbard is a little transparent. Darkfang has a little green glow.

Sword are standalone. Craftable, upgradeable and can be enchanted. For people who dont like crafting. u can find them in riverwood. stored in a barrel.

If u like one of them *thumps up* :D

Any suggestions about dmg or some are welcome

===================================
Install: 
===================================

Extract into Skyrim\\Data

===================================
Uninstall:
===================================

Delete
Data\\Darkfang.esp
Data\\meshes\\Weapons\\Soulfang 
Data\\meshes\\Weapons\\Darkfang
and
Data\\Textures\\Weapons\\DarkFang
Data\\Textures\\Weapons\\Soulfang

Greez Bloodysunday

Known bugs:
Bloodmap doesnt fit exactly

===================================
Credits
===================================

http://thefree3dmodels.com
Bethesda Softworks
Blender Foundation
Nifskope Team
Bloodysunday
author: Bloodysunday

files.changelogHtml: Fixed Bloodmap. Added recipes for crafting, upgrading. enchandable
